title: Instant Pot Sloppy Joes
directions: In a large skillet, heat up the olive oil over high heat. Add in the onions and brown.
Add in the ground beef and cook until brown. Drain if necessary.
Once the meat is cooked, add in the brown sugar and stir to dissolve and mix in.
Add in the soup, ketchup, vinegar, salt and pepper. Stir to mix.
Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve in hamburger buns.

title: Instant Pot Sausage, Rice + Beans
directions: Add the sesame oil to a large skillet or wok over high heat.
Add in the onions and brown.
Add in the sausage and corn and stir around for a few minutes until warmed through.
Add the sweet chili sauce to the pan and mix to stir.
Add in the beans, bring to the boil and then simmer for 5-10 minutes.
Remove from the heat and mix in the rice.
Season with salt and pepper

title: Instant Pot Hawaiian Meatballs with Coconut Rice + Macaroni Salad
ingredients: 2.5 cups coconut milk, (or subsitute the same amount of liquid that your rice packet states)
1 20oz-can pineapple chunks, do not drain juice
directions: FOR THE MACARONI SALAD
In a small mixing bowl, whisk together 0.75 cups milk, 0.5 cup mayonnaise, brown sugar, salt and pepper. Set aside.
Boil a pot of water, add a little salt to the water and cook the pasta until it is fat and soft.
Drain the past and put it back in the pot. Add in the vinegar and stir to coat the pasta.
Pour the pasta into a large bowl and cool for 10 minutes.
Add the milk/mayo mixture into the pasta, stir and cool completely.
Add the remainder of the macaroni salad ingredient, stir to combine and refrigerate for atleast an hour.
FOR THE COCONUT RICE
Add the rice and coconut milk into the rice cooker to cook.
FOR THE MEATBALLS
Place meatballs in the bottom of the Instant Pot. Add in the diced peppers, undrained pineapple chunks, brown sugar, vinegar and soy sauce.
Lock in the lid on the Instant Pot and turn the knob to sealing.
Set the instant pot to manual/pressure cook for 7 minutes.
Quick release the instant pot and stir.
Serve the meatballs over the rice, with a scoop of the mac salad on the side.

title: Instant Pot Broccoli Cheese Soup
directions: Press the Saute button. Melt butter and add in the onion. Saute for 5 minutes.
Add chicken stock, broccoli, carrots, and nutmeg.
Put lid on Instant Pot, turn the knob to sealing and press the Manual/Pressure Cook button with a cook time of 4 mins
Do a quick release and stir in cream.
Set the pot to Saute button again, but do not boil. Stir in cheese.
Use an immersion blender to blend the soup in the pot to your desired consistency

title: Instant Pot Black Bean Coconut Stew
ingredients: 2.5 cups coconut milk, (or subsitute the same amount of liquid that your rice packet states)
directions: FOR THE COCONUT RICE
Add the rice and coconut milk into the rice cooker to cook.
FOR THE STEW
Press the saute button on the instant pot and add in the coconut oil.
Add cilantro and cumin into the oil and saute until fragrant.
Add in the onion, garlic + ginger in and saute for a couple of minutes.
Add in beans, sweet potato and vegetable stock.
Put the lid on the instant pot and turn the knob to sealing. Set the pressure cook/manual button to 25 minutes.
When cooked, natural release the pot for 8 to 10 minutes, then quick release to fully release the pressure.
Add in coconut milk + lime juice. Season with salt + pepper.
Turn the pot on to saute and simmer for about 15 minutes to thicken up the stew.
Serve stew over coconut rice and top with fresh cilantro.

title: Instant Pot Creamy Southwest Chicken Soup
ingredients: 1 16oz-can light red kidney beans, drained and rinsed
4 oz cream cheese, softened and cut up
directions: Set instant pot to saute and place the butter in the bottom of the pot to melt.
Add the onion and garlic to the pan and saute until fragrant and slightly browned.
Add in the beans, tomatoes, corn, chicken stock, red wine and seasonings to the pot and stir to blend.
Put the lid on the instant pot. Make sure the pot is set to sealing and set manual/pressure cook for 5 minutes.
Quick release the instant pot and add in the cans of chicken and stir.
Add in the cream cheese and stir until blended.
Serve warm as is or with with chopped cilantro, diced green onions, chopped tomatoes, shredded cheese and sour cream.

title: Cilantro Lime Chicken Taco Salad
directions: Add the chicken, beans, diced tomatoes, sweetcorn, salsa, onion, spices, garlic and lime juice to the bottom of the instant pot.
Lock in the lid, turn the knob to sealing and set the manual/pressre cook button to 25 minutes.
Quick release the pressure. Remove and shred the chicken.
Put the shredded chicken back in the pot and stir to combine.
Serve the chicken on top of salad mix, add in optional toppings.

title: Instant Pot Chicken Taquitos with Mexican Rice
ingredients: 0.25 cup fresh cilantro leaves, finely chopped
directions: FOR THE TAQUITOS
Place chicken breasts into the bottom of your instant pot.
Add in chicken broth and sprinkle in taco seasoning.
Close the lid and turn the knob to sealing.
Set instant pot to manual/pressure cook for 15 minutes for fresh chicken and 25 minutes for frozen chicken.
Quick release the pot when the time is up.
Preheat the oven to 400°F.
Take the chicken out of the instant pot and shred it on a cutting board with 2 forks or bear claws.
Add shredded chicken to a medium mixing bowl.
Add the cream cheese and salsa to the chicken and stir together until cream cheese is melted and incorporated.

On a clean, flat surface assemble the taquitos by placing a tortilla, add 1/8th of the chicken mix in a line down the tortilla and an even amount of the shredded cheese on top. Leave a little gap at the top and bottom of the tortilla so the filling doesn't spill out.
Roll up the taquitos tightly and repeat with the rest of the tortillas, chicken and cheese.

Once rolled, place the tacquitos seam side down on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and spray the top lightly with cooking oil. These taquitos freeze really well, so you can freeze them at this point too if you have more than you need for supper.
Bake 15-20 minutes until golden brown and the cheese is bubbling. If cooking from frozen, bake for 25 minutes and flip halfway through baking.
FOR THE RICE
Place the onion and the tomatoes and their juices into a blender or food processor and process until smooth.
Add the tomato mixture to a large saucepan, stir in the chicken stock, salt and cumin and bring to the boil over a medium low heat.
While the tomato mixture is boiling, toast the rice. Heat the coconut oil in a skillet, add the uncooked rice and saute, stirring frequently, until lightly toasted and golden (about 5 minutes).
Add in the garlic and cook for a minute or two more.
Add the rice into the tomato mixture and stir to combine.
Reduce the heat to low, cover and simmer until the liquid is absorbed into the rice, about 15 minutes.
Remove the rice from the heat, fluff with a fork and set aside to steam for about 10 minutes.
Add in the cilantro and lime juice and fluff again to combine.
Serve taquitos and rice with shredded lettuce and sour cream.

title: Instant Pot Tater Tot Casserole
ingredients: 4 tsp bisto gravy granules, or other gravy mix
directions: Add 1 cup of water into the bottom of the instant pot and place the trivet in too.
Add the ground beef on top of the trivet, put the lid on and turn the knob to sealing.
Press the manual/pressure cook button for 10 minutes for fresh ground beef or 25 minutes for frozen ground beef
When the timer is up, let the pot natural release for 10-15 minutes.
Remove the ground beef from the instant pot and place it into a medium mixing bowl.
The meat will still be the same shape as when you put it into the instant pot, so use a chop + stir to break up the ground beef.
Preheat the oven to 425°F.
Drain out the instant pot and give it a quick rinse, then turn the pot to saute and add in the olive oil to heat up.
Add the onion, garlic, paprike and cumin to the instant pot and saute until the onions are translucent.
Add the ground beef back into the instant pot and stir to combine.
Add the frozen mixed vegetable to the instant pot and pour in 2 cups of water.
Bring to the boil. add in the gravy granules and stir until the granules are all dissolved and the gravy has thickened a little.
Transfer the beef mixture evenly to an 8x11 (2qt) casserole dish.
Top the casserole with a single layer of frozen tater tots.
Bake the casserole for 25 minutes.

title: Instant Pot Chickpea Korma
directions: Turn instant pot onto high saute and add in the butter.
When butter is melted, add in onions and garlic and saute for about 5 minutes, until fragrant and browned.
Add in the peas, vegetables, chickpeas and korma simmer sauce.
Secure the lid on the instant pot, set the know to sealing and set to manual/pressure cook for 5 minutes.
Natural release for 5 minutes, then quick release and remove the lid.
Stir and serve, with cooker rice and optionally naan bread.

title: Instant Pot Garlic Ginger Chicken Bahn Mi Style Sandwich
directions: FOR THE PICKLED CARROTS
Put the shredded carrots into a medium mixing bowl.
Add in the salt and 2 tsps of the sugar to the carrots.
Massage the carrots for about 5 minutes, until the carrots become flexible. Drain the carrots.
In a small mixing bowl, add 1 cup lukewarm water and then mix in the vinegar and the remainder of the sugar.
Put the carrots into a large widemouth mason jar and pour in the vinegar sugar mixture. The pickeld carrots will keep for up to a monht in the fridge.
FOR THE VIETNAMESE MAYONNAISE
Combine all vietnamese mayo ingredients together in a small bowl and set aside.
FOR THE CHICKEN
In a small bowl, add 1/4 cup of water, then add in soy sauce, honey, sugar, vinegar, garlic, ginger and onion until combined.
Add the chicken breasts to the bottom of the instant pot and pour the sauce over the top of the chicken.
Add lid and turn the knob to sealing. Press the manual/pressure cook button for 25 minutes for frozen chicken breasts.
When time is done, quick release the instant pot.
Take the chicken out of the instant pot and shred with 2 forks or bear claws.
Add the chicken back into the pot and mix the chicken into the sauce.
TO SERVE
To assemble the sandwiches, cut the bolillo rolls into half lengthwise.
Spread vietnamese mayo on each side of each of the rolls and split the chicken evenly between all of the sanwiches.
Top with some of the picked carrots, a few cucumber spears and a little cilantro.

title: Instant Pot Fish Taco Bowls with Lime Cream Sauce
ingredients: 2.5 cups coconut milk, (or subsitute the same amount of liquid that your rice packet states)
directions: Add the rice and coconut milk into the rice cooker to cook.

Place fish in a flat bottomed pan in one even layer. Pour lime juice, zest, chili powder, garlic powder and salt over the top of the fish. Let them sit and marinate for 10 minutes. Then turn over the fish with a fork and let them sit for another 10 minutes.
Pour 1 cup of water in the bottom of your Instant Pot liner. Place trivet in bottom of the pot. Place fish in one layer if possible, if not spread it out as much as possible.

Cover the Instant Pot and secure the lid. Make sure valve is set to sealing. Set the manual/pressure cook button to 2 minute (for fresh fish) or 4 minutes (for frozen fillets). When time is up let the pot sit for 5 minutes and then move the valve to venting. Remove the lid. Fish should be at least 145°F in the middle.
Place fish in a bowl and break it up with two forks. Salt and pepper to taste.
Make the sauce by whisking the sour cream, mayo, lime juice, zest, cumin, garlic powder, cayenne and kosher salt together.
Serve the fish on the coconut rice in a bowl with the lettuce, street corn, sauce and cilantro.

title: Instant Pot Chili Lime Salmon
directions: Stir all the sauce ingredients together in a small bowl and set aside at room temperature.
Pour 1 cup of water into the bottom of the instant pot and add in the trivet.
Add salmon filets onto the trivet and season the top with salt + pepper.
Put the lid on the instant pot and turn the knob to sealing. Set the pressure cooker/manual button for 3 minutes for fresh salmon and 8 minutes for frozen salmon.
Once instant pot finishes cooking quick release the pressure.
Remove the lid and take out the salmon carefully.
Serve salmon over a bed of quinoa. Spoon the chili lime sauce over the salmon and add salad to the side.
